nTab replaces your google chrome new tab page with a beautiful, well designed, page that promotes productivity! 

Easily track what you need to do with the built in to-do list feature.
The to-do list will even persist across devices with the power of chrome storage sync.

Choose from a variety of beautiful landscape backgrounds, including our SpaceX and NASA photo collection!
